title: Fanance Club - Sports Player's DEX
description: Many people hesitate to invest in the stock/crypto market due to a lack of knowledge about the projects. Requires a lot of time and research

f6_assessments.q1:
- This proposal it's very well written and has several links to support its idea. However, in order to benefit it even more, it would be very helpful if the proposal showed more milestones (what do we can expect to see and when) more detailed.
- Another point is to detail a bit more the budget, e.g., 30% of it is going to marketing, but which strategies are going to be used?
- Which sports are going to be added at the beginning, which leagues, which country, etc.?
f6_assessments.q2:
- a point is adding some metrics: #people expected, # of bettings, volume traded, etc.
- also add a more detailed budget, including strategies, for example.

f6_assessments.q0: Without going into the ethics of trading on players' profiles and capability from a purely business initiate the idea is unique and has a sizable market. Comparing to the stock market may not be right because stocks are securities representing real-world assets. However, this trading with player's performance is a lucrative market in the sports-crazy world and will reinforce the image of the gambling-centric crypto world.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal is from a strong team most of them are Ex Emurgo employees and have strong crypto associations. The team also has validated the concept in solidity hence the implementation in Plutus will just be a migration and is likely to be achieved in time.
f6_assessments.q2: The budget has 10k USD from legal expenditure and the team is not citing any tie-up with any established sports club. Most of the players are already under contract obligation which controls most of their activities. As of now " Fanance Club is in plans to partner with players and associations to gain more credibility". This is a critical step that can make or break the project in long term. A good tie-up will be expensive. The development and data integrity are secondary issues. However, it is always better to have the technology lead that way. The project has a clear deliverable and its success can be measured easily based on the number of trades that happen on the platform.

f6_assessments.q0: Unique and clever use of blockchain tech.  Baseball card trading has met fantasy football.  I see this bringing in a crowd that would otherwise not have interest in the crypto world.
f6_assessments.q1: Strong dev team.  The marketing on this is a key component.  The team has laid out a comprehensive plan in this area.
f6_assessments.q2: The road map is very general.  What are the specific steps required for development and implementation?

f6_assessments.q0: This is something that could brinig so much value to end users, and a lot of those end users are going to be new entrant into crypto. Particpants have the chance to use their knowledge with things they love in order to make financial gains, as well as learn more about the stock market and assets.
f6_assessments.q1: They have a good sized team with a lot of former ERGO developers and team members. Their former positions and experience lead me to believe they have what it takes for this to be implemented successfully. I would like to see more details on their go to market strategy, a long with some timelines for that as well. Any specifics add confidence for the proposal's success.
f6_assessments.q2: They have provided a number of key metrics and milestones for us to reference, but I would like to see dates for a more efficient audit. Do they plan to do this al concurrently, or will they have a step by step plan to development, market, and implement this idea.

f6_assessments.q0: the cross of a DEX and fantasy sports is an interesting one. Fantasy sports could bring a whole new user base to cryptocurrency an thus aligns with the challenge brief of encouraging integration and adoption
f6_assessments.q1: If the given credentials are to be trusted, the team is highly qualified to produce a DEX of this nature. some groundwork has been laid. A technical roadmap/timeline of the DEX development is not specified, but several marketing approaches are given.
f6_assessments.q2: Funds are allocated to 4 categories. A more specific breakdown of the DApp roadmap would be appreciated. It should be easy to judge the functionality of the DApp, and the results of the marketing strategy.
